name: Blazing Duel (Bazyleeshek)
description:
Entry for  the 3rd Blackthornprod Game Jam! Blazing Duel is a sword fighting game inspired by the theme: "less attacks - more damage"! Fight a powerful opponent on shrinking platforms and try not to fall into lava!

CONTROLS

A/D or arrow keys to move

Space to jump

LMB to attack

RMB to parry

GUIDE

Here's a quick overview of the mechanics in case if the game is too confusing.

Parry enemy attacks to gain attack points.

Attack points empower your next attack.

The enemy can parry you as well. If he parries you when you have no attack points, you get stunned.

By attacking and parrying, you can deplete the enemy stamina. When out of stamina, the enemy is stunned and left open for attacks. Attacking the enemy while he's stunned also heals you.

Resource management is key. Decide whether you want to use your empowered attack to deplete stamine quicker or deal more damage. The arenas are constantly shrinking, so you need to kill the enemy ASAP.

Develop a strategy, learn the moveset and overcome your opponent!
